name: Jepha
content: Jepha was a human female bounty hunter active during the Imperial Era. After Domina Tagge of the House of Tagge placed a bounty on the rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra, Jepha was one of several hunters who attempted to capture her on Arveesh Station, alongside Uleen'Arael. Their shot on Aphra was blocked by the Wookiee bounty hunter Krrsantan, and Jepha attempted to shoot him out of their way. As Krrsantan attacked Jepha in retaliation, Aphra escaped, but was later captured by Just Lucky and Kharrek.
